org.cs2c.nginlib.config
接口 RemoteOperator

所有已知子接口：
Configurator
public interface RemoteOperator

作者：
Mikes

RemoteOperate interface is responsible for operating nginx configuration file. The operations includes add, delete and update configuration file elements. This interface also supports query for specific elements of configuration file. Each method have to indicate the target block through the parameter of outerBlockNames.

For example, if we want put "redirect" directive appending to the second block "if":
http {
server {
if {
...
}
if {
...
}
}
}

Then, outerBlockNames can be "http:0|server:0|if:1". "if:1" means the second if block. The index of block is from zero. If there is no index in outerBlockNames, default the first block.

另请参见：
Configurator

方法摘要
 void append(Element element, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Put the element at the end of the target block.
 void delete(Element element, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Delete the specific element in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.
 java.util.List<Block> getBlocks(java.lang.String blockName, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Query all blocks with the specific block name in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.
 void insertAfter(Element element, Element after, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Insert the specific element after another element in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.
 void replace(Element oldElement, Element newElement, java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
          Replace the specific old element with the new element in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.
 

方法详细信息

append

void append(Element element,
            java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
            throws RemoteException
Put the element at the end of the target block. The parameter of outerBlockNames give all blocks out of the target block in order to find the target block.

参数：
element - Element to be append.
outerBlockNames - Indicate the target block position.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

delete

void delete(Element element,
            java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
            throws RemoteException
Delete the specific element in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.

参数：
element - Element to be deleted.
outerBlockNames - Indicate the target block position.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

insertAfter

void insertAfter(Element element,
                 Element after,
                 java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
                 throws RemoteException
Insert the specific element after another element in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.

参数：
element - Element to be inserted.
after - Element after which the new element is inserted.
outerBlockNames - Indicate the target block position.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

replace

void replace(Element oldElement,
             Element newElement,
             java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
             throws RemoteException
Replace the specific old element with the new element in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.

参数：
oldElement - The element need to be replaced.
newElement - The element Which will replace the old one.
outerBlockNames - Indicate the target block position.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

getBlocks

java.util.List<Block> getBlocks(java.lang.String blockName,
                                java.lang.String outerBlockNames)
                                throws RemoteException
Query all blocks with the specific block name in the specific block which the outerBlockNames string indicates.

参数：
blockName - The name of block which will be query.
outerBlockNames - Indicate the target block position.
返回：
All blocks in a list, which have the block name in the block outerBlockNames specifying.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.
